entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
